attributes.action: give guy fawkes a posthumous pardon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the tricky, embroiled politics of the time it is feasible that Mr Fawkes, whilst acting on his best intentions, possibly went about things in an incorrect manner. I`m sure that if he was more politically savvy he would have simply created a focus group to work within the system to create change.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
